Member Function Documentation

int hal::SwitchboardConnection::error_number ( ) const
inline

Returns the error number associated with the is_stopped_on_error() condition.

u16 hal::SwitchboardConnection::id ( ) const
inline

Returns the connection ID value.

If this value is equal to invalid_id(), the connection is not valid.

SwitchboardTerminal hal::SwitchboardConnection::input ( ) const
inline

Returns a copy of the input terminal.

static u16 hal::SwitchboardConnection::invalid_id ( )
inlinestatic

Returns the value assigned to invalid index values.

bool hal::SwitchboardConnection::is_stopped_on_error ( ) const
inline

Returns true if the connection has stopped on an error.

bool hal::SwitchboardConnection::is_valid ( ) const
inline

Returns true if the object holds valid information.

s32 hal::SwitchboardConnection::nbyte ( ) const
inline

Returns the number of bytes transferred on the last transaction.

If this value is negative, then an error has occurred.

u32 hal::SwitchboardConnection::o_flags ( ) const
inline

Returns the status flags of the connection.

SwitchboardTerminal hal::SwitchboardConnection::output ( ) const
inline

Returns a copy of the output terminal.

void hal::SwitchboardConnection::print ( ) const

Prints details about the connection on the standard output.

void hal::SwitchboardConnection::set_input ( const SwitchboardTerminal &  value)
inline

Sets the connection's input terminal.

void hal::SwitchboardConnection::set_output ( const SwitchboardTerminal &  value)
inline

Sets the connections's output terminal.
